tests.title: Test Your Skills
tests.subtitle: Discover your potential and plan your future with our comprehensive assessment

hero.title: Ready to conquer the SAT?
hero.description: Take comprehensive SAT practice tests that mirror the real testing experience. Get detailed analysis, personalized feedback, and track your progress over time.

realExam.title: Real Test Experience
realExam.description: Official SAT format with accurate timing and question types

detailed.title: Detailed Analysis
detailed.description: Get comprehensive reports on your strengths and areas for improvement

adaptive.title: Adaptive Learning
adaptive.description: Personalized practice based on your performance patterns

fullLength.title: Full-Length SAT Test
fullLength.description: Complete SAT experience with all sections and official timing

sample.title: Sample Test
sample.description: A sample test to practice your skills

readingWritingMath.title: Reading, Writing, and Math Test
readingWritingMath.description: Comprehensive assessment to evaluate your academic skills and potential

tests.startNote: Take the first step towards your future
tests.info: Ready when you are. Take your time to do your best.
tests.exitConfirmation: Are you sure you want to exit? Your progress will be lost.

testScreen.intro: This test consists of two modules: Reading and Writing, and Math. Each module has two parts with a specific time limit.
testScreen.thankYou: Thank you for completing the test.
testScreen.pendingDescription: You're about to start Part {{partNumber}} of the {{moduleName}} module.
testScreen.breakTimeDescription: Take a 10-minute break before starting the Math module.

readingWriting.name: Reading and Writing
readingWriting.description: Tests your reading comprehension and writing skills

math.name: Math
math.description: Tests your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities

testNotFound.title: Test Not Found
testNotFound.message: The test you're looking for doesn't exist or is no longer available.
testNotFound.suggestion: Please check the test ID or start a new test from the tests page.
testNotFound.reason1: The test ID is incorrect or invalid
testNotFound.reason2: The test has expired or been removed
testNotFound.reason3: You don't have permission to access this test
testNotFound.reason4: There was a temporary server error
testNotFound.helpText: If you continue to experience issues, please contact our support team for assistance.

testResults.title: Test Results
testResults.errorMessage: Unable to load test results. Please try again.
testResults.noResultsMessage: Could not find results for this test.

resetPassword.passwordNoSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character

resetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

register.terms: I agree to the terms of use and privacy policy

carousel.title: Effective & Fast SAT Preparation
carousel.description: SAT-standardized tests with auto-grading, detailed answer explanations, and result analytics.

carousel.title: Comprehensive Practice Features
carousel.description: Experience realistic SAT mock tests, assess your skills, and improve your scores.

carousel.title: Ready to Boost Your SAT Score?
carousel.description: Practice now and track your progress!

heroSection.title: See the
heroSection.description: Including a system of standardized tests to predict your career, providing a list of knowledge and skills to equip and a program to accompany you. In addition, Future Me also introduces you to reputable learning institutions and career advice from successful people in the field.

cta.title: Ready to discover your career path?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students who have found their direction with Future Me

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: With useful and exciting features, Future Me believes you will have a great experience.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from students, parents, and tutors who have experienced success with our platform
testimonials.cta: Join thousands of students who have improved their SAT scores with Future Me

testimonial1.name: Nguy·ªÖn Minh Anh
testimonial1.content: Future Me helped me improve my SAT score by 200 points! The practice tests are incredibly realistic and the explanations are so detailed.

testimonial2.name: Tr·∫ßn ƒê·ª©c Minh
testimonial2.content: The interface is clean and easy to use. I love how the platform tracks my progress and identifies areas where I need more practice.

testimonial3.name: L√™ Th·ªã H∆∞∆°ng
testimonial3.content: As a parent, I appreciate how comprehensive this platform is. My daughter's confidence in math has improved tremendously.

testimonial4.name: Ph·∫°m Ho√†ng Nam
testimonial4.content: The reading comprehension practice is excellent. The variety of passages really helped me prepare for the actual test.

testimonial5.name: V√µ Th·ªã Mai
testimonial5.content: I recommend Future Me to all my students. The detailed analytics help me understand where each student needs more support.

testimonial6.name: ƒê·∫∑ng Qu·ªëc B·∫£o
testimonial6.content: Used this platform throughout my senior year. The practice tests were so similar to the real SAT, I felt completely prepared.
